index.title: Home Page
index.heading: Welcome to My Website
index.paragraph1: This is the home page of our responsive and multilingual website. Here you can find general information about what we offer.
index.paragraph2: Explore our other sections to learn more about us and the services we provide.

nosotros.title: About Us
nosotros.heading: Who Are We?
nosotros.paragraph1: We are a passionate team dedicated to [your business area]. Our mission is to [your mission].
nosotros.paragraph2: With years of experience in the sector, we strive to offer innovative and high-quality solutions to our clients.

servicios.title: Our Services
servicios.heading: Services We Offer
servicios.service1Desc: We create modern and functional websites, tailored to your needs and goals.
servicios.service2Desc: We advise you on digital strategies to optimize your online presence and reach your target audience.
servicios.service3Desc: We boost your brand through effective digital marketing campaigns and results measurement.
